body_html:
May be your BN layer is not synchronized version? Small batch size is sensitive to the mean and var values. For semantic segmentation, especially reproducing PSPNet, synchronized batch norm is necessary.
FYI. http://hangzh.com/PyTorch-Encoding/notes/syncbn.html

body:
May be your BN layer is not synchronized version? Small batch size is sensitive to the mean and var values. For semantic segmentation, especially reproducing PSPNet, synchronized batch norm is necessary.
FYI. http://hangzh.com/PyTorch-Encoding/notes/syncbn.html
